verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard הַכְּנַעֲנִ֤י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanite מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- And [when] king עֲרָד֙ <S%H6166><s%> 'a-Rad Arad יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev which dwelt הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> han-Ne-gev, in the south כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba came יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, tell that Israel דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way הָאֲתָרִ֑ים <S%H871><s%> ha-'a-ta-Rim; of the spies וַיִּלָּ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-La-chem then he fought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, against Israel וַיִּ֥שְׁבְּ׀ <S%H7617><s%> vai-Yishb and took מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu some שֶֽׁבִי׃ <S%H7628><s%> She-vi. [some] of them prisoners

וַיִּדַּ֨ר <S%H5087><s%> vai-yid-Dar vowed יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel נֶ֛דֶר <S%H5088><s%> Ne-der a vow לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar; and said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If נָתֹ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Ton If thou wilt indeed תִּתֵּ֜ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this בְּיָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di, into my hand וְהַֽחֲרַמְתִּ֖י <S%H2763><s%> ve-ha-cha-ram-Ti then I will utterly destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-rei-Hem. their cities

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' hearkened יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol to the voice יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and delivered up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, the Canaanites וַיַּחֲרֵ֥ם <S%H2763><s%> vai-ya-cha-Rem and they utterly destroyed אֶתְהֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Hem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עָרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5892><s%> 'a-rei-Hem; them and their cities וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and he called שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom of the place חָרְמָֽה׃ <S%H2767><s%> cha-re-Mah. Hormah פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, And the people בֵּֽאלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him against God וּבְמֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> u-ve-mo-Sheh and against Moses לָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah Why הֶֽעֱלִיתֻ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-li-Tu-nu Wherefore have ye brought us up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt לָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> la-Mut to die בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; desert כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein is no לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> le-chem bread וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and no מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, neither [is there any] water וְנַפְשֵׁ֣נוּ <S%H5315><s%> ve-naf-She-nu and our soul קָ֔צָה <S%H6973><s%> Ka-tzah, loatheth בַּלֶּ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bal-Le-chem food הַקְּלֹקֵֽל׃ <S%H7052><s%> hak-ke-lo-Kel. this light

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am Therefore the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh to Moses וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said חָטָ֗אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-nu, We have sinned כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because דִבַּ֤רְנוּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-nu for we have spoken בַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh against the LORD וָבָ֔ךְ va-Vach, הִתְפַּלֵּל֙ <S%H6419><s%> hit-pal-Lel and against thee pray אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- with יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וְיָסֵ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> ve-ya-Ser that he take away מֵעָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lei-nu and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנָּחָ֑שׁ <S%H5175><s%> han-na-Chash; the serpents וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <S%H6419><s%> vai-yit-pal-Lel prayed מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh from us And Moses בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad for הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. for the people

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses עֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Seh Make לְךָ֙ le-Cha שָׂרָ֔ף <S%H8314><s%> sa-Raf, thee a fiery serpent וְשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> ve-Sim and set אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on נֵ֑ס <S%H5251><s%> Nes; it upon a pole וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall come כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everyone הַנָּשׁ֔וּךְ <S%H5391><s%> han-na-Shuch, and it shall come to pass that every one that is bitten וְרָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'Ah when he looketh אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2425><s%> va-Chai. upon it shall live

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as made מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses נְחַ֣שׁ <S%H5175><s%> ne-Chash a serpent נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet, of brass וַיְשִׂמֵ֖הוּ <S%H7760><s%> vay-si-Me-hu and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַנֵּ֑ס <S%H5251><s%> han-Nes; it upon a pole וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, came אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if נָשַׁ֤ךְ <S%H5391><s%> na-Shach had bitten הַנָּחָשׁ֙ <S%H5175><s%> han-na-Chash and it came to pass that if a serpent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, any man וְהִבִּ֛יט <S%H5027><s%> ve-hib-Bit when he beheld אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about נְחַ֥שׁ <S%H5175><s%> ne-Chash the serpent הַנְּחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> han-ne-Cho-shet of brass וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2425><s%> va-Chai. he lived

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U set forward בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּאֹבֹֽת׃ <S%H88><s%> be-'o-Vot. in Oboth
